mapper.select: SELECT SC.ID_STUDENT AS idStudent, Q.ID_SUBJECT AS idSubject, Q.QUALIFICATION AS qualification FROM QUALIFICATIONS Q, STUDENT_CLASSROOMS SC, STUDENT_SUBJECTS SS WHERE Q.ID_STUDENT = SC.ID_STUDENT AND SC.ID_STUDENT = SS.ID_STUDENT AND Q.ID_SUBJECT = SS.ID_SUBJECT AND YEAR (Q.CREATE_DATE) = YEAR (SYSDATE) AND SS.END_DATE IS NULL AND SC.END_DATE IS NULL AND SC.ID_CLASSROOM = #{classroomId}
